ingredients.ingredient: 1 French baguette, cut into 1/2 inch slices
12 fresh basil leaves, cut into thin strips
8 black mission figs, cut in quarters

cookingTips: Toast bread lightly to provide sturdy base but keep it slightly soft inside
Spread ricotta generously on bread while still warm to soften it slightly
Drizzle aged balsamic vinegar just before serving for maximum flavor impact
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user create fresh, simple fig and ricotta crostini with a drizzle of aged balsamic vinegar.
